description: Configuration class for setting up auditing and filtering in a Spring Boot application. It enables JPA auditing and registers a custom authentication user filter for API endpoints.

classes.name: AuditConfig
classes.description: Spring configuration class for enabling JPA auditing and registering a filter for authentication user filtering.

methods.name: myAuditorProvider
methods.description: Defines an AuditorAware bean that provides auditing information, returning an instance of AuditorAwareConfig.

methods.name: authUserFilter
methods.description: Defines and registers a custom filter for authentication user filtering applied to API URL patterns.
